data.title: Marie Madeleine
data.meta_description:
Again by Marie Madeleine, released 09 April 2024

Bitterness has drowned my heart
All .. my plans .. have come apart
I’ve come unstuck, I’ve come undone
I’ve seen despair blot-out the sun

I’ve seen despair blot-out the sun
you can Tell yourself you’re not to blame
but your Dancing with the fire
so Hide your heart til none remain

to take it

to fake it

data.text:
Revealed in 2010, sanctified in 2021, Marie Madeleine never dies!

Passion according to Marie Madeleine is made up of songs that go wrong, dissidence and ecstasy, where the feminine always wins.
